Once upon a time, in a quiet meadow, lived a curious bunny named Thistle. One day, while exploring an ancient oak tree, Thistle stumbled upon a shimmering pocket watch half-buried in the ground. Intrigued, he pressed the button, and in a flash of light, he found himself in the bustling streets of 1920s Paris.

With wide eyes, Thistle hopped through cafes, marveling at flapper dresses and jazz music. He made friends with a clever fox who taught him to dance. After a whirlwind adventure, Thistle returned home, forever changed. Now, every night, he dreams of new eras, eager for his next time-traveling escapade.
